card.name: High-Handed One
card.text: High-Handed One has menace as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Carnivorous Conscience
card.text: Deathtouch Carnivorous Conscience gets +1/+1 if an opponent owns a card in exile.

card.name: Inexorable Ferryman
card.text: When Inexorable Ferryman enters the battlefield, choose one — • Return target creature card or Aura card from your graveyard to your hand. • Target opponent discards a card.

card.name: Sky Stealer
card.text: Flying Whenever Sky Stealer enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, return target creature or Aura card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Seekers of Qirauz
card.text: Seekers of Qirauz can't be blocked by enchanted creatures.

card.name: Curse of Guilt
card.text: Enchant player When Curse of Guilt enters the battlefield, create a 2/1 red Nightmare creature token. Nightmares may attack enchanted player as though they had haste.

card.name: Wayward Guide
card.text: Enchant creature When Wayward Guide enters the battlefield, each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life. Enchanted creature gets +3/+2. Substantiate {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Visions of Decay
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 if it's a Dream or a Nightmare. Otherwise it gets -3/-3. Substantiate {3}{B} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Starfield Serpent
card.text: {B}, Exile a card from your graveyard: Starfield Serpent gains menace until end of turn.

card.name: Stalking Hunter
card.text: When Stalking Hunter enters the battlefield, you may put target creature card or Aura card with substantiate from your graveyard on top of your library.

card.name: Peaceful One
card.text: Peaceful One has trample as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Fox's Cunning
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2. Substantiate {G}{G} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Spry Seedling
card.text: Vigilance

card.name: Sylvan Influence
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3. Substantiate {1}{G}{G} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Wandering Bloom
card.text: Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mindfire Ritualist
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) When Mindfire Ritualist enters the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on target enchanted creature.

card.name: Slinking Stalker
card.text: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your graveyard, Slinking Stalker gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Skittering Fear
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+3 and has reach. Substantiate {3}{G} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Forest's Guile
card.text: Enchanted creature gets +4/+4. Substantiate {4}{G} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Night's Undergrowth
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.)

card.name: Figure of Worship
card.text: {2}{G}, Exile Figure of Worship from your graveyard: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

card.name: Fire-Wreathed One
card.text: Fire-Wreathed One has first strike as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Unblinking Sentinel
card.text: Unblinking Sentinel enters the battlefield with your choice of a haste counter or a menace counter on it.

card.name: Blood Hunter
card.text: Blood Hunter enters the battlefield with a menace counter on it as long as you control another creature with menace.

card.name: Bouncing Boulder
card.text: When Bouncing Boulder enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target opponent equal to the numbers of cards you've drawn this turn.

card.name: Electric Nerves
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has first strike. Substantiate {2}{R} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Oathless Night
card.text: Double strike

card.name: Panoptic Aggressor
card.text: Panoptic Aggressor has first strike as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Solemn Hatebringer
card.text: {2}{R}, Discard a card: Draw a card. This ability costs {1} less if you control another creature with haste and {1} less if you control another creature with menace.

card.name: Grasping Maw
card.text: Haste Whenever Grasping Maw enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Secret-Filled One
card.text: Secret-Filled One has ward {1} as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Silent Envisioner
card.text: {2}, {T}: Look at the top card of your library. If it's an Aura card, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

card.name: Solemn Starweaver
card.text: Flying Solemn Starweaver gets +2/+0 as long as you've drawn two or more cards this turn.

card.name: Lambent Phantasm
card.text: Flying When Lambent Phantasm enters the battlefield, draw a card. Then discard a card unless you control a Curse.

card.name: Ghost of Inspiration
card.text: Flash When Ghost of Inspiration enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Prodigal Prophecy
card.text: When Prodigal Prophecy enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card. Whenever you exile a card from your graveyard, scry 1.

card.name: Speaker of Lost Tongues
card.text: Flying Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Abstraction {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Imperious Idea
card.text: Whenever Imperious Idea deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card. If that player was enchanted, instead you scry 1 then draw a card.

card.name: Shimmering Curse-Hunter
card.text: Shimmering Curse-Hunter can't attack unless defending player is enchanted. Abstraction {2} ({2}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Mournful One
card.text: Mournful One has vigilance as long as it's enchanted.

card.name: Constellation Reader
card.text: {W}, {T}: Choose target creature. If it has first strike, it gains double strike until end of turn. Otherwise, it gains first strike until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.

card.name: Disciple of Lursk
card.text: When Disciple of Lursk enters the battlefield, put a vigilance counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Many Faces of Courage
card.text: Many Faces of Courage enters the battlefield with your choice of a first strike or vigilance counter on it.

card.name: Sacred Ideal
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap an untapped creature you control. If you do, Sacred Ideal enters the battlefield with a flying counter on it.

card.name: Whispers of Life
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Lifelink

card.name: Meditative Memory
card.text: Meditative Memory enters the battlefield with a flying counter on it if you control a creature with flying, and a lifelink counter on it if you control a creature with lifelink.

card.name: Questing Night
card.text: When Questing Night enters the battlefield, you may attach target Aura you control to it.

card.name: Prowling Figment
card.text: Prowling Figment enters the battlefield with a vigilance counter on it as long as you control another creature with vigilance.

card.name: Repressed Bravery
card.text: Repressed Bravery can't attack or block unless you control a creature with lesser power.

card.name: Mothwing Mystic
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) When Mothwing Mystic enters the battlefield, exile target card from a graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 white Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Cloud Skimmer
card.text: Flying Cloud Skimmer enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it for each opponent who owns a card in exile.

card.name: Dispel Engram
card.text: Exile target creature if it's enchanted or if its power is 4 or greater.

card.name: Menhir Ritual
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Into the Sky
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Destroy target attacking creature.

card.name: Ride the Storm
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If it's enchanted, it also gains ward {2} until end of turn.

card.name: Air from Stone
card.text: Enchant creature You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you pay {2} more to cast it. Enchanted creature has flying.

card.name: Hushed Serenity
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature creature you control, then put an additional +1/+1 counter on each creature that instilled this spell.

card.name: Startle Awake
card.text: Destroy all Auras and Equipment attached to target creature.

card.name: Golden Trumpeter
card.text: When Golden Trumpeter attacks, you may pay {2}. If you do, create a 1/1 Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Golden Legate
card.text: Whenever Golden Legate becomes tapped, if it isn't being declared as an attacker, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Candle-Lit Dreamer
card.text: Whenever Candle-Lit Dreamer attacks, tap up to X target creatures, where X is the number of Auras attached to Candle-Lit Dreamer.

card.name: Sainted Serpent
card.text: Sainted Serpent enters the battlefield with your choice of two different counters on it from among first strike, flying, and lifelink.

card.name: Wayfaring Valkyrie
card.text: Flying Whenever Wayfaring Valkyrie enters the battlefield or attacks, you may exile a creature card from a graveyard. When you do, create a 1/1 white Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Drifting Voyager
card.text: Drifting Voyager enters the battlefield with your choice of three different counters on it from among flying, first strike, vigilance, and lifelink.

card.name: Golden Choir
card.text: When Golden Choir enters the battlefield, exile target creature an opponent controls until Golden Choir leaves the battlefield. Golden Choir gets +1/+1 for each creature card among cards in exile.

card.name: Chittering Companion
card.text: Flying When Chittering Companion enters the battlefield, choose one— • Draw a card. • Return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Discordant Piping
card.text: When Discordant Piping enters the battlefield, target creature phases out until Discordant Piping leaves the battlefield. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until they phase in again.)

card.name: Trapped in Stone
card.text: Enchant nonland permanent Enchanted permanent is a 0/4 Sculpture artifact creature and loses all abilities.

card.name: Runic Vigor
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control with flying, first strike, double strike, haste, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, vigilance, and/or ward. (Count each creature only once.)

card.name: Burnished Glory
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +X/+X, where X is the number of creatures you control. Substantiate {1}{W}{W} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Silent Sleep
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Each player can't cast more than one spell each turn.

card.name: Curse of Amnesia
card.text: Enchant player When Curse of Amnesia enters the battlefield, enchanted player mills two cards. At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player mills two cards.

card.name: Earthbound Logic
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Dream you control or pay {1}. Counter target spell.

card.name: Confront the Subconscious
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Dream creature. Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}.

card.name: Leave Isolated
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. {1}{U}: Tap enchanted creature.

card.name: Reach through the Veil
card.text: Enchant player When Reach through the Veil enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted player's maximum hand size is reduced by one. This effect can't reduce a player's maximum hand size to less than five.

card.name: Lursk's Plot
card.text: Draw three cards. Then discard two cards unless you discard an Aura card.

card.name: Imagined Sight
card.text: Return target creature and all Auras attached to it to their owners' hands. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Lost in Obscurity
card.text: Draw a card. Then target creature gets -X/-0 until end of turn, where X is the number of cards you've drawn this turn.

card.name: Nervous Energy
card.text: Tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step. Draw a card. Abstraction {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Haunting Song
card.text: Enchant creature You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you pay {2} more to cast it. Enchanted creature has "{T}: Target player mills two cards."

card.name: Daydream Guide
card.text: {1}{U}, Sacrifice Daydream Guide: Counter target spell that targets a permanent you control. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sun-Lit Dreamer
card.text: Whenever Sun-Lit Dreamer attacks, scry X, where X is the number of Auras attached to Sun-Lit Dreamer.

card.name: Conjure to Life
card.text: Enchant non-Aura enchantment Enchanted enchantment is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.

card.name: Lambent Charger
card.text: When Lambent Charger enters the battlefield, draw a card. Then discard a card unless you control a Curse.

card.name: Cloudbreacher
card.text: Flying Abstraction costs you pay cost up to {1} less. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Somnambulancer
card.text: Tap an untapped Dream you control: Until end of turn, whenever Somnambulancer deals combat damage to a player, draw a card. Tap two untapped Dreams you control: Somnambulancer can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Sullen Knave
card.text: When Sullen Knave enters the battlefield, return up to one target Aura to its owner's hand.

card.name: Prognosticate
card.text: Target opponent looks at the top four cards of your library and puts them back in any order. You may exile the top card of your library. Draw two cards.

card.name: Wave of Fluidity
card.text: Counter target spell. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Night's Wake
card.text: Enchant player When Night's Wake enters the battlefield, draw two cards, then discard a card. Whenever you draw a card, enchanted player mills two cards.

card.name: Vision of Qirauz
card.text: Target permanent you don't control phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.)

card.name: Curse of Sloth
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of your end step, choose target permanent enchanted player controls. That permanent doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Broken Patience
card.text: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls get -1/-0.

card.name: Arena of Blood
card.text: Exile target creature or planeswalker. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Weight of Age
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. If enchanted creature would die, exile it instead.

card.name: Beckoning Doom
card.text: Enchant player When Beckoning Doom enters the battlefield, enchanted player sacrifices a creature. Whenever a creature enchanted player controls would die, exile it instead.

card.name: Haunting Grief
card.text: Exile target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Darkest Recesses
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw two cards. If the sacrificed creature was enchanted, return up to one Aura card that was attached to it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Soul's Voyage
card.text: Enchant player Whenever a creature enchanted player controls dies, you may sacrifice Soul's Voyage. If you do, enchanted player loses 2 life and you return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand

card.name: Yawning Vortex
card.text: Enchant player When Yawning Vortex enters the battlefield, enchanted player discards two cards. Whenever enchanted player discards a card, that player loses 1 life.

card.name: Sinew Aflame
card.text: Enchant creature You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you pay {2} more to cast it. Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.

card.name: Face the End
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control and return all Auras attached to it to their owners' hand.".

card.name: Ghostlight Prowler
card.text: Ghostlight Prowler can't block. When Ghostlight Prowler dies, if it was enchanted, each opponent loses 3 life.

card.name: Moon-Lit Dreamer
card.text: Whenever Moon-Lit Dreamer attacks, defending player loses X life, where X is the number of Auras attached to Moon-Lit Dreamer.

card.name: Specter's Guise
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 and has "Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player discards a card." Substantiate {B}{B}{B} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Cthonic Pursuit
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +3/+3 and has "At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature and you lose 1 life." Substantiate {2}{B}{B} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Inevitable Scavenger
card.text: When Inevitable Scavenger enters the battlefield, you may return target Curse card from a graveyard to the battlefield attached to target opponent.

card.name: Withered Nag
card.text: Deathtouch Abstraction—Pay 3 life. (Pay 3 life, exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Horned Fragment
card.text: When Horned Fragment enters the battlefield or dies, look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal a Curse card from among them. Put that card into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.

card.name: Evanesce
card.text: Exile target creature with power 2 or less.

card.name: Scavenger's Blessing
card.text: Choose target Aura card with enchant creature in your graveyard. Create a 2/1 Nightmare creature token then return that Aura card to the battlefield attached to it.

card.name: Picked Clean
card.text: All creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn. If a creature would die this turn, exile it instead unless its controller pays 2 life.

card.name: Dark Reaches of the Mind
card.text: Target opponent discards two cards. You create a 2/1 red Nightmare creature token.

card.name: Heed the Beyond
card.text: Search your library for three cards with different names, reveal them, then shuffle. Target opponent separates them into two piles Put one pile into your hand and exile the other.

card.name: Wave of Mortality
card.text: Enchant player When Wave of Mortality enters the battlefield, exile enchanted player's graveyard. If a creature card would be put into enchanted player's graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Compelling Strike
card.text: Compelling Strike deals 3 damage to any target. Put a first strike counter on up to one target creature.

card.name: Magmatic Collapse
card.text: Magmatic Collapse deals 3 damage to target creature. If that creature is enchanted, Magmatic Collapse deals 2 damage to its controller.

card.name: Crown of Malice
card.text: Enchant creature When Crown of Malice enters the battlefield, untap enchanted creature and it gains haste until end of turn. You control enchanted creature. At the beginning of the end step, sacrifice Crown of Malice.

card.name: Swallow the Sun
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn. Enchanted creatures you control get an additional +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Pull from Slumber
card.text: Discard a card, then draw a card. Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn.

card.name: Night's Fervor
card.text: Enchant creature You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you pay {2} more to cast it. Enchanted creature has haste and trample.

card.name: In the Light of the Moon
card.text: Choose target creature. If it has any counters on it, it gets +3/+2 until end of turn. Otherwise, it gets +2/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Sudden Paroxysm
card.text: Enchanted creatures can't block this turn.

card.name: Glorious Immolation
card.text: Until end of turn, target creature gains "When this creature dies, it deals damage equal to its power to any target".

card.name: Hateful Memory
card.text: Haste Hateful Memory enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it if you've drawn two or more cards this turn, and a double strike counter on it if you've drawn four or more cards this turn.

card.name: Bronze-Lit Dreamer
card.text: Whenever Bronze-Lit Dreamer attacks, it deals X damage to target player or planeswalker, where X is the number of Auras attached to Bronze-Lit Dreamer.

card.name: Martial Paragon
card.text: Martial Paragon enters the battlefield with your choice of two different counters on it from among haste, reach, and trample.

card.name: Sorrow's Blade
card.text: When Sorrow's Blade enters the battlefield, target creature you control gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of differently named counters on permanents you control.

card.name: Towering Terror
card.text: Whenever Towering Terror attacks, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. Whenever you draw a card other than the first one you draw in each of your draw steps, target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Lightning Mantle
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +5/+1 and has haste and trample. At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice Lightning Mantle. Substantiate {1}{R}{R}{R} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Carnal Reaver
card.text: When Carnal Reaver dies, if it was enchanted, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw three cards.

card.name: Thrashing Storm
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, tap an untapped Nightmare you control or pay {1}. Thrashing Storm deals 4 damage to target opponent.

card.name: Rumbling Tumult
card.text: Rumbling Tumult deals 2 damage to each creature. Creatures dealt damage this way can't block this turn.

card.name: Show of Strength
card.text: Choose target creature you control and target creature you don't control. The creature you control gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each counter on it. Then those creatures fight each other.

card.name: Eager Focus
card.text: When Eager Focus enters the battlefield, you may discard a card. If you do, draw a card. The first Aura you cast each turn costs {1} less to cast.

card.name: Fading Icon
card.text: Fading Icon enters the battlefield with a double strike counter, a haste counter, and a trample counter on it. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may move a counter from Fading Icon to a creature you control. If there are no counters on Fading Icon, sacrifice it.

card.name: Distressing Engram
card.text: Return target instant or sorcery card or target Aura card with substantiate from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Inner Wilds
card.text: Enchant creature When Inner Wilds enters the battlefield, enchanted creature fights up to one target creature. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Substantiate {R} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Sylvan Pulse
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

card.name: Song of Swords
card.text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Commune with Night
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library. You may reveal an enchantment or land card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Face to the Sun
card.text: Enchant creature You may cast this spell from your graveyard if you pay {2} more to cast it. Enchanted creature has vigilance.

card.name: Night's Caravan
card.text: Night's Caravan deals 1 damage to each creature with flying.

card.name: Ancient Mindscape
card.text: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Add two mana of any one color."

card.name: Mourning Sun
card.text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Verdant Rover
card.text: Whenever Verdant Rover becomes the target of an Aura spell, create a 1/1 green Dream creature token. If that Aura has substantiate, create two of those tokens instead.

card.name: Gilt-Lit Dreamer
card.text: Whenever Gilt-Lit Dreamer attacks, it gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Auras attached to Gilt-Lit Dreamer.

card.name: Acrid Sludge
card.text: Deathtouch When Acrid Sludge enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.

card.name: Darkvein Viper
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Deathtouch Whenever Darkvein Viper deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Lord of the Wild
card.text: Trample When Lord of the Wild dies, it was a creature, return it to the battlefield. It's an Aura enchantment with enchant land you control and "Enchanted land is a 3/3 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land."

card.name: Ponderous Citysaur
card.text: Reach, trample {3}{G}, Exile Ponderous Citysaur from your graveyard: Create three 1/1 green Dream creature tokens.

card.name: Earthspeaker
card.text: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your graveyard, Earthspeaker fights target creature you don't control. This ability triggers only once per turn. Abstraction {3} ({3}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Brooding Macaque
card.text: Trample Whenever Brooding Macaque deals combat damage to a player, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

card.name: Impossible Growth
card.text: Enchant permanent When Impossible Growth enters the battlefield, draw a card. Enchanted permanent has "{T}: Add one mana of any color."

card.name: Captive Earth

card.text: Substantiate costs you pay cost {1} less.

card.name: Flame Eater

When Sintering Howl is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, return target Aura card not named Sintering Howl from your graveyard to your hand. card.name: Inner Power
card.text: Inner Power deals X damage to any target and you gain X life, where X is the number of differently named counters on permanents you control.

card.name: Hallowed Behemoth
card.text: Whenever you exile one or more cards from your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Hallowed Behemoth. Abstraction {G}{U} ({G}{U}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Fleet of Foot
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has haste. Substantiate {2}{R} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: He Who Dreamed Himself
card.text: He Who Dreamed Himself enters the battlefield tapped and doesn't untap during your untap step. Whenever He Who Dreamed Himself becomes untapped, destroy all other nonland permanents.

card.name: Illusion QYR
card.text: Flying

card.name: QYR Draft Archetypes QYR
card.text: {W}{U} DREAMS Such things as dreams are made of—Summon Dreams to war and prosper. {U}{B} CURSES Your foe's misfortune is your fortune. Curse your opponent to suffer. {B}{R} NIGHTMARES Cast an army of your opponent's worst fears and rally to victory. {R}{G} AGGRO SUBSTANTIATE Your Auras don't even need a target to hit hard, so hit the ground running while your foe is still building. {G}{W} INSTILL Your army can help you call down bigger spells. Go wide and hit hard. {W}{B} EXILE Reach beyond existence and draw strength from the exile zone. {U}{R} CARD DRAW Knowledge is power. Draw more, do more, win more. {B}{G} MIDRANGE SUBSTANTIATE Your Auras and creatures can outlast and outlive your foe. Be the last one standing. {R}{W} KEYWORDS Muster a trained force of able creatures and benefit from their varied skills. {G}{U} ABSTRACTION Trade in the memories of spells in your graveyard for new cards and never be short of something to do.

card.name: Eternity's Horizon
card.text: When Eternity's Horizon enters the battlefield, search your library for a card named Heart of the Sea or a card named Timeless Heartwood, reveal it, shuffle, then put it on top of your library. At the beginning of your end step, gain 1 life for each legendary artifact you control.

card.name: Lursk the Piper
card.text: Lursk the Piper enters the battlefield with a music counter on it. {T}: Put a music counter on Lursk. At the beginning of your end step, untap each other creature you control with mana value equal to or less than the number of music counters on Lursk.

card.name: Spellweaver Volute
card.text: Enchant instant card in a graveyard Whenever you cast a sorcery spell, copy the enchanted instant card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Spellweaver Volute to another instant card in a graveyard.

card.name: Fleshweaver Volute
card.text: Enchant creature card in a graveyard Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, create a token that's a copy of the enchanted creature card. If you do, exile the enchanted card and attach Fleshweaver Volute to another creature card in a graveyard.

card.name: Floral Stream

card.name: Anointed Clearing

card.name: Lambent Coven

card.text: Sun Swallower has ward {3} as long as it's enchanted. {1}{G}, Exile an Aura card from your graveyard: Put two +1/+1 counters on Sun Swallower. Activate only once each turn.

card.name: That Which Understands
card.text: Noncreature cards in your graveyard have abstraction {3}. ({3}, Exile the card from your graveyard: Draw a card. Activate only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Ashiok, Nightmare Sire
card.text: [+1]: Target player exiles a card from their hand. [-2]: You get an emblem with "Nightmares you control get +1/+1." [-3]: Exile target graveyard. Create an X/X black Nightmare creature token, where X is the number of cards exiled with Ashiok, Nightmare Sire.

card.name: Dhuron the Remembrancer
card.text: {U}{B}, {T}, Discard a card: Create a blue and black Aura Curse enchantment token named Dhuron's Hex attached to target player. The token has "enchant player" and "At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player mills four cards."

card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player mills four cards.

card.name: The Golden King

card.name: The First Regret
card.text: Lethal damage dealt to creatures is determined by their power rather than their toughness.

card.text: Menace Ardo Klen, Daybreaker gets +1/+1 for each card type among cards in exile.

card.name: Cyclical Memories
card.text: Ward—Pay {1} and 2 life. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 1 and 2 life.) Cyclical Memories gets +1/+1 for each Aura you control and +1/+1 for each Aura card in your graveyard.

card.name: Pride
card.text: Haste, vigilance, trample As long as Pride is in your graveyard and you control a Mountain and a Plains, creatures you control enter the battlefield with your choice of a haste counter, a vigilance counter, or a trample counter on them.

card.name: Dhuron's Refusal
card.text: Flash Enchant player Enchanted player can't draw cards. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Dhuron's Refusal.

card.text: Enchant library Enchanted library can't be searched. That library's owner may pay {2} for that player to ignore this effect until end of turn.

card.name: Keeper of Possibilities
card.text: Whenever you activate an ability of a card that's not on the battlefield, you may pay {2}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Irrepressible Heat can't be countered if it was instilled by three or more creatures. Irrepressible Heat deals 7 damage to target player.

card.name: Furious Anger
card.text: If an enchanted creature you control would deal damage to a permanent or player, it deals double that damage to that permanent or player instead.

card.name: Show of Dominance
card.text: Target opponent discards a card. If they discard a nonland card with mana value less than the number of lands they control, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

Whenever Archon of Deliverance deals combat damage to a player, return target card from your graveyard to your hand if it shares a card type with the exiled permanent.

card.text: Whenever Golden Champion attacks, if it's enchanted, other Dreams you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Silent Aftermath

Substantiate {R} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: Paragon of Primacy
card.text: Whenever you cast an Aura spell that targets a creature you control, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy. (A copy of a permanent spell enters the battlefield as a token.)

card.name: Quest for Fire
card.text: Draw three cards. At the beginning of your next end step, you lose the game.

card.name: Austere Arbiter
card.text: At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, choose one— • Players can't activate planeswalkers' loyalty abilities this turn. • Players can't cast more than one noncreature spell this turn. • Nonbasic lands enters the battlefield tapped this turn.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {2}, {T}: Exile target Aura card from your graveyard. If you do, create a 1/1 white Illusion creature token with flying.

card.name: Yesterday's Monument
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add two mana of any one color. Activate only if Yesterday's Monument is enchanted.

card.name: Piece by Piece
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control an enchanted artifact, an enchanted creature, an enchanted enchantment, and an enchanted land, you win the game.

card.name: Into Forever
card.text: Instill (You can dream this spell into being. Each creature you tap as you cast this spell pays for {1}, plus {1} for each Aura attached to that creature.) Take an extra turn after this one. Exile Into Forever.

card.name: Stolen Secrets
card.text: Search target opponent's library for up to three cards with different names, then that player shuffles. That opponent exiles two of those cards, then you may cast the last without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Inexorable Evolution
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +6/+6 and has haste, trample, and ward {3}. Substantiate {2}{G}{G}{G} (You may cast this for its substantiate cost; when you do, create a 0/0 colorless Dream creature token and attach this to it.)

card.name: The Deep and the Dark
card.text: The Deep and the Dark enters the battlefield tapped. {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Add {C} for each Mine you control.

card.name: Lower Conscience
card.text: You, other permanents you control, and spells you control can't be the target of spells or abilities you don't control.

card.name: Flickering Ward
card.text: Enchant creature As Flickering Ward enters the battlefield, choose a color. Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove Flickering Ward. {W}: Return Flickering Ward to its owner's hand.

card.name: Overwhelming Splendor
card.text: Enchant player Creatures enchanted player controls lose all abilities and have base power and toughness 1/1. Enchanted player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities or loyalty abilities.

card.name: Fraying Sanity
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of each end step, enchanted player mills X cards, where X is the number of cards put into their graveyard from anywhere this turn.

card.name: Paradox Haze
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's first upkeep each turn, that player gets an additional upkeep step after this step.

card.name: Cruel Reality
card.text: Enchant player At the beginning of enchanted player's upkeep, that player sacrifices a creature or planeswalker. If the player can't, they lose 5 life.

card.name: Curse of Vengeance
card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, put a spite counter on Curse of Vengeance. When enchanted player loses the game, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of spite counters on Curse of Vengeance.

card.name: Curse of Opulence
card.text: Enchant player Whenever enchanted player is attacked, create a Gold token. Each opponent attacking that player does the same.

card.name: Splinter Twin
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: Create a token that's a copy of this creature, except it has haste. Exile that token at the beginning of the next end step."

card.name: Bear Umbra
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has "Whenever this creature attacks, untap all lands you control." Totem armor

card.name: Pattern of Rebirth
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, that creature's controller may search their library for a creature card, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
